songs.title: Crying Shame
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Too Late
And yeah baby it's too late
And time has made the spell obey
And now it's time to desecrate

[Pre-Chorus]
But we had a dream
And it was meant to be
And we were kissing gods
Against all the odds

[Chorus]
Now it's a crying shame
And it's a crying shame
We don't know who to blame
It'll never be the same
And it's a crying shame

[Verse 2]
Too much
And we demolish too much
And yeah we really fucked it up
Yeah baby you lost your touch

[Pre-Chorus]
But we had a dream
And it was meant to be
And we were kissing gods
Against all the odds

[Chorus]
Now it's a crying shame
And it's a crying shame
You don't know who to blame
It'll never be the same
And it's a crying shame

And it's a crying shame
